Best game i've ever played

Don't get me wrong, I've put a lot of hours into the game thus far, if only to feed my addiction to the gameplay. There is no other game like dead by daylight out there, believe me I've looked. That being said, it's gone remarkably downhill since I have begun to play, particularly around the release of the k-pop collection. For one tunnel killers ruin the fun of the game - survivors can't escape because they're being camped and it ruins the ability for them to rank in a season which is frustrating I only just was able to hit a brief 15 rank before I got a series of tunnel campers and it went back up to 16 because I couldn't escape the hook. The overall player toxicity has gone up as well, which is rather disappointing but is expected of any major game. The updates are definitely geared towards the favour of the killers, which makes it all the more difficult for survivors. If the game wasn't so addicting (and I normally don't like the horror genre) I would have stopped playing awhile ago.

Edit: It appears to have only gotten worse the more I've played

I've stuck with DBD for almost 4, going on 5 years. It's a game filled with a somewhat divided playerbase, but overall addicting gameplay. Yes, there's a ton of shit behavior could do and fix. But overall the game is very fun and enjoyable.. until you fight your sixth hundred SWF or Prestige 3 Spirit.

Don't get this game if you get easily tilted. Get it if you enjoy finding depth in a character and learning as time goes on. There's plenty to learn, and you're going to absolutely get fucked more than once.

If you're having a good day, or you're looking for a nice game to play - don't play Dead by Daylight.

I've played Dead By Daylight for quite a long time, and I've gone from loving it when I first bought it, to hating it recently. The game itself can be pretty fun, it can allow for a lot of teamwork, some fun scares at times, and can even be really interesting at times. But there are SO many issues with this game that have stopped my friends and I from even wanting to log on anymore.

Firstly, a lot of the games you play you will either experience a tunneller or a camper. This just sucks the love and fun out of an already boring game at times. Especially after the absolutely botched ranking system. Why would I - a rank 13 new player - want to go against a rank 1 killer?! Who's idea even was that?!

Secondly, while some killers and maps can be very balanced, a few of them aren't. Like spirit! Spirit, I love her, she's amazing to play - but shes horrendous to play against! It's no surprise people DC when playing against spirit, there is no counter for her! 

And even worse still, the devs won't do anything to fix the issues! Now, I know a lot of people will say "but the devs are trying their hardest" or "your just a bad player" etc, but a lot of the issues it has taken so long for them to fix; and these fixes are half assed, half baked, temporary fixes which don't help at all. Especially in a case where, at least the way I see it, a lot of the gameplay "fixes" are aimed towards killers. And yes, the whole point of having "4 survivors against 1 killer" is to make the killer more powerful than the survivors, that's why there's more survivors. But some killers are either too hard to go against because they have overpowered abilities, or are too easy because the devs left too much RNG into their ability. 

Which, although isn't a huge issue, is still an issue. RNG is in a lot of killers mechanics, which makes it way too unfair on the killers side to make it fair for them. Most incidence of this is our poor Amanada, or "The Pig". RNG plays way too much into her gameplay, which is why not a lot of people play her.

There are a lot more issues I could talk about, but this post is already too long. But, point of this post is, just don't buy it. It isn't worth your money, and it isn't worth your time. Just spend your money and time on another game, where the community is less toxic and the devs actually care about the community in which they are trying to reach.

Tremendo juego, muy divertido y profundo mecanicamente, con casi 800 horas es evidente que estoy enamorado de este juego, lo unico malo es que tiene unos bugs y que al principio cuando apenas empiezas no tienes habilidades y se te puede hacer un poco monotono, pero cuando le encuentras el gusto a las mecanicas de juego y ya empezas a tener habilidades y personajes, todo cambia para mejor siempre y te empieza a encantar, con un roster de killers de videojuegos o peliculas famosas del cine de terror slasher que me encanta, aprovechen y comprenlo y siempre tengan en cuenta que hay que tener paciencia y tranquilidad porque se ve simple, pero enrealidad es super complejo el juego y divertido, espero que les haya servido la reseña.

If you're playing the game solo as survivor, and you get above silver 4 rank, good luck. It's nothing but toxic killers and survivors who couldn't care less about your progression.

For some reason though, it's addictive. I hate it and love it at the same time. I wish console players weren't in the match making though.

Dead by Daylight - это многопользовательская игра в жанре ужасов в режиме (4 против 1), где один игрок берет на себя роль жестокого Убийцы, а четыре других игрока являются Выжившими, пытающимися сбежать от убийцы. В этой чудесной игре вы найдёте себе много друзей. Получите много эмоций. Хотя игра требует для себя много внимании. Игра чудесная всем советую

- Selling the base game (which comes with seven super generic characters)
- Selling the DLCs (each monster has its DLC)
- Selling the season pass 
- Selling the market (cosmetics)

It's not Free2Play; if I pay for the game, I want the whole game and not willing to spend money on DLC, Season Pass or Market.
I'm not recommending it and asking for a refund.
